A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a fantastic movie\, perhaps the best Star Wars movie yet.  I think many of the bad reviews are from people who just didn't get it. The fundamental message is about how spiritual non-duality is the only way to truly be able to overcome evil in the world.  It did a brilliant job of exploring the trials and pitfalls of trying to fight evil through Luke's story.  If you didn't like it\, read a bit about Dzochen in Buddhism and then watch the movie again.  Heros and martyrs can only slow down evil\, not transform it.
